---
title: "Sending data to SQL server"
---

```{r libraries}
library(RMySQL)
library(RMariaDB)
rmysql.settingsfile <- "/etc/.my.cnf"
SKY.db <- dbConnect(MariaDB(),dbname='SKY',username='chabefer',password='mathima13',host='sylvaindata.cnphnexfo8mm.us-west-2.rds.amazonaws.com')
#dbname='SKY',username='chabefer',password='mathima13',host='sylvaindata.cnphnexfo8mm.us-west-2.rds.amazonaws.com')
#group='SKY_amazon_chabefer')
SKY.db <- dbConnect(MariaDB(),group='SKY_amazon_chabefer',default.file=rmysql.settingsfile)
```

```{r sendingGCP}
data.GCP <- gsheet2tbl("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1RKZZuAAnGMUKgoFTQskVSCoMsOxzpcPp-RCZbHgvsK8/edit?usp=sharing")
colnames(data.GCP) <- c("paper.id","authors","year","cost","se.cost")
data.GCP <- as.data.frame(data.GCP)
dbWriteTable(SKY.db,'GCP',data.GCP,overwrite=TRUE)
```
